title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Intelligent security: Protection at scale from development to production-INV214
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 智能安全：从开发到生产的大规模保护-INV214
abstract: How should your security practice adjust to handle the increasing volume of solutions your builders are creating with the help of AI? What should you do as threat actors leverage the very same tooling to reduce the cost of their attacks? Join AWS VP & CISO, Amy Herzog as she explores the answer to these questions. You’ll learn about the architectural choices and technical tradeoffs you will face as you adapt how you approach security in your business. Using real-world examples, Amy will share the strategies you need to implement AI-powered, automated protections at scale in your environment.
abstract_cn: 随着构建者在AI帮助下创建的解决方案数量不断增加，您的安全实践应该如何调整？当威胁行为者利用相同的工具来降低攻击成本时，您应该怎么办？加入AWS副总裁兼首席信息安全官Amy Herzog，探索这些问题的答案。您将了解在调整业务安全方法时面临的架构选择和技术权衡。Amy将通过真实案例分享您需要在环境中大规模实施AI驱动的自动化保护所需的策略。
